#summary How to use colors in xsw.

= Introduction =

Colors can be referred to in two ways: by their code or by their name.

== By code ==

Colors can be refered by code, such as this: `$FF00FF` (this is pink). It's just like the [http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-html40/types.html#h-6.5 HTML color standard], except that it uses the character `$` instead of `#`.
